With the great benefit that he got from the loan, he managed to build a better outfitted space for his corn mill, and now it has a better look, and with this advance he is very satisfied but doesn't settle for that, because he now has the need to build a wall for his house, which only is covered with wood and with the insecurity it faces in this season, he is very concerned. So, for this, he hopes to get the loan as soon as possible so this construction can begin. He needs to purchase cement, lime powder, concrete blocks and rebar. 

Valentín hopes to be able to purchase a plot of land and also a motorcycle to get around.

loans.use: to purchase cement, lime powder, concrete blocks and rebar.

loans.name: Venera

texts.ru: Венера, 38 лет, замужем, есть  детей. У нее среднее образование, в качестве дохода для свое семьи занимается сельским хозяйством. У нее есть 3 коровы, 40 овец. На сегодняшний день деятельность Венеры приносит ежемесячную прибыль в сумме 12,800 сом (KGS). Для дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, она обратилась в Банк «Бай – Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS), который направит на покупку скота. Доходы от кредита Венера планирует использовать для развития своего хозяйства.
texts.en:
Venera is 38 and married with children. She has a high school education and works in farming as a source of income for her family. She has three cows and 40 sheep and her business currently brings in 12,800 KGS monthly.

In order to further develop her business, Venera has approached Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 50,000 KGS to purchase livestock. She plans to use profits from the loan to develop her farm.

loans.use: to buy additional livestock in order to increase her herd

loans.name: Calamarqueñas Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “CALAMARQUEÑAS” iniciará el primer ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Senkata, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Elizabeth es la Presidenta. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de comida, venta de papa y chuño, venta de queso, venta de leche, venta de pan, tienda de barrio. 

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Elizabeth es integrante, ella indica que es la primera vez que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por una promoción de un asesor que es parte de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de comida; da a conocer que este negocio lo inicio hace veinte años por iniciativa propia. 

El crédito que ahora sacará será para el aumento de capital compra de cuchara y platos por mayor que adquirirá de las vendedoras de la ciudad de El Alto esta compra le ayudará a  comercializar los platos de comida que la señora elabora para posteriormente comercializarlo en su puesto de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para apoyar a su familia económicamente, ya que ella es casada y tiene tres hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta la capacitación que ofrece la institución.
texts.en:
The “CALAMARQUEÑAS” communal bank will begin its first loan cycle with Pro Mujer, as part of the Centro Focal de Senkata. It is made up of eight members and is led by officers, of whom Elizabeth is the president. The businesses which the members of the communal bank carry out are varied and among them are food sales, potato and freeze-dried potato sales, cheese sales, milk sales, bread sales and a neighborhood store.

The loan that they will get out will benefit the small business owners of whom Elizabeth is one. She says that this is the first time that she joined Por Mujer, joining through the promotion of a staff member of the institution. Currently, she has a business selling food. She explains that she began this business twenty years ago by her own initiative. 

The loan that she is now getting out will be to increase her capital purchasing spoons and plates in bulk which she will get from the salespeople in the city of El Alto. This purchase will help her to sell her dishes, which she makes to later sell at her sales location. This way of working allows her to generate resources to support her family economically, since she is married and has three children.

When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she responds that she likes the training that the institution offers.

loans.use: to purchase plates and spoons.
